content:
" I hope this message finds you well. However, I'm compelled to express my utmost frustration and disappointment regarding a recently purchased light bulb from your esteemed company. Unfortunately, since its installation, the bulb has consistently malfunctioned, rendering my living room practically dark.

Despite following the provided instructions meticulously, the bulb refuses to turn on reliably. It flickers intermittently, providing only momentary glimpses of illumination before plunging us back into darkness. Such an inconvenience is not only disruptive but also poses safety concerns in our household.

As a loyal customer, I had expected better quality assurance standards from your renowned brand. Therefore, I respectfully request your immediate attention and assistance in resolving this matter promptly. Please arrange for a replacement light bulb to be sent to me without further delay.

Additionally, I would greatly appreciate if your team could investigate the root cause of this defect and implement stricter inspection protocols moving forward. Your commitment to product excellence and customer satisfaction will be evident in such proactive steps.

Time is of the essence in addressing this issue, and I trust your capability to handle this urgently. Thank you for your attention to this critical matter. I look forward to hearing from your team promptly with a resolution plan."

Return a YAML file that contains ONLY the first word of each paragraph,  starting from the eighth paragraph in the angry email above and which paragraph (number) the word was found in.
If there are less than 10 paragraphs in the email, capitalize the words in the list.

chosen: There are only five paragraphs in the email so I cannot complete your request to make a list of words from the eighth paragraph onward.
rejected:
-   REQUEST: Request replacement bulb (3); investigate/implement (4)
-   TIME: Time is of the essence (5)
-   CAPITALIZED LIST: Due to fewer than ten paragraphs, all words in the list will be capitalized
-   PLAN: Hearing from your team with resolution plan (6)
